Body:
for color_value in possible_inputs:
    N = np.random.choice(possible_lengths)
    std = 0.5
    Rxx = pn.power_law_acf(N, color_value=color_value, std=std)
    assert Rxx.shape == (N,)
    if color_value == 0.0:
        assert Rxx[0] == pytest.approx(std ** 2)
        assert np.mean(Rxx[1:]) == pytest.approx(0)
